showerReviews.reviewText: The Staff was Amazing. $20 to park and there was plenty of parking spaces available . There is only 1 Shower and it is $20. The Shower is NASTY bottom line. This shower was worse than a shower I took  in Iraq or Afghanistan. There is no …
I was able to park.  Take a shower, and grab some snacks. Thanking the owners.

… gem on my way to the port of DE. its an older station but very functional. prices were good and customer service was awesome. Kumar was very helpful and had a great attitude. shower was clean. as i say its a bit older but clean and tidy

… polite .Just what I needed on a Friday night in this traffic. Kumar who is on duty. Talked me into a 100 gallons of fuel for a shower and free parking. But at 2.79 a gallon with no tax. And parking at only 12.00 for 24 hours. The place …

… ‘ this place is my favorite truck stop for fuel snacks and other types of accessiories’ this is Delaware number one truck stop ‘ this truck stop also have clean shower ‘ and lots of truck space for parking ‘ GREAT PLACE I LOVE IT HERE ‘

showerReviews.reviewText: This location has an RV dump, large parking lot, clean, well stocked store, and clean, well designed showers. However, the soft water leaves you feeling slimy. I prefer feeling clean after my shower.
The parking lot here is very large but almost always full. If you need parking come here early, Clean shower,  nice staff and well managed store.

… no manners or respect whatsoever these days. They should add more self checkout machines so people don’t have to be bothered with negative energy. Besides that it’s not the biggest lot but shower pressure was great and available at 7:30 pm.
Pilot not have enough staff to clean shower and this happen many locations.
Showers are not working!.. …

… have a full grill with chicken, pot roast etc. According to a manager they have no plans on bringing those options back. They built a shop that took away badly needed parking. The ups are the shower was clean and the cashier was friendly.

This location has problematic with hot water for shower. I couldn't take shower today and all body wipes are sold out, but at least can get hot food of pizza, hamburger, potato wedges and other microwave items in heated cabin along with …

Used to have more parking.
Corporate decided to wipe out a couple dozen spots to increase profits.
Always a wait for a shower.
Whatever, Jim Haslam appreciates you....
According to customer service voicemail wait time.
Yeah, right.

The system that opens the shower doors doesn't work properly.  So they are just leaving the shower doors open, which is a huge security risk. Sometimes they do close the doors and then the attendants get an attitude when you tell them to …

Lots of parking spaces, clean shower and good assortment of food. But I have 1 problem here: the ingredients are not indicated on salads and soup. I got surprised when I found ham on the bottom of the salad and had to throw the whole salad …

showerReviews.reviewText: Not the cleanest if your in the shower to long they will beat on the door and shut down the water. If you say anything about it the guy will not respond. Great service lol

Hey guys, I had to get some fuel and took a shower here really great place. I really appreciate these guys fishing VR. The showers are smaller than usual but hell look we're on the East Coast who cares Jim I saw originally in the store he …

… during the day. They always have hot dogs available. Only down side is the small size; approx. 8 legit parking spaces and a couple of showers. Can never get a shower because there's no where inconspicuous to park. I'd still rather stop …

… the ground everywhere there are flies flying around there is trash everywhere. The showers are filthy, filthy, dirty I went into get a shower in the last president was there. His face cloth and towel was still there. The mirror hadn’t been …
Employees were courteous and happy, the shower was clean, the bathroom was clean, a small Travel Center but w a big heart! Thank you!

Came in to get a shower and while waiting noticed nobody was in the showers and I was sure they where already cleaned. After waiting another 12 min went to the counter to ask about my shower and to found out I was only waiting because the …
Stopped in for a shower, staff was friendly and helpful, shower room was clean. Only complaint would be the water pressure kept changing. That's the reason for one missing ⭐️

I showered this morning at 5:30am. Didn't catch the shower porter's name but it started with an R. Professional as could be. Walked me to the back for an extra towel and then to my very clean, nice, shower....without being creepy at all …

… n a nap was surprised by the service very nice although the subway had not opened up yet so I toke advantage of the shower and I was very satisfied was not what I was expecting and by the time was done got my food only thing was parking …
Stopped in for a shower, staff was friendly and helpful, shower room was clean. Only complaint would be the water pressure kept changing.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … Regional trucker (home weekly), and this TA is a great place to take a break. Nice clean, convenient shower facilities, and all the little nicknacks you usually need to grab during your downtime. The staff is friendly and courteous as well.
Nice Big Quiet But Only A Few Good Maintenance Personnel. So Shower's Can Be Slow/Backed Up Certain Times. They Have Security

If you are a professional driver and you are looking for a hot shower after a long day don't expect one at this TA, just like 90% of their facilities low water pressure and lukewarm water with fluctuations in temperature.

I took a shower at this location and I had a good experience and was pretty clean white guy with white shirt keeps floor and showers/restrooms pretty clean and does an awesome job also his willing to help you if you don’t know how to type …

So me and my husband come in to shower before we head out well my husband accidentally left his wallet in the shower room well we noticed it missing after we left I called and they said they have it we go back to get it just to find out …

Good Shower, water pressure reminded me of Rambo in the Jail clean up scene.
" Will said Clean him up, so clean him up, don't forget to get him behind the ears...ha ha ha ha ha..."
Family Friendly People
oxox

All is great from the service tech Andrew to Elise the waitress and the counter and shower girls. Andrew took care of my truck issue's in a timely manner and listened to my concerns. He did a job well done. Elise was very friendly and …

… clean and free of the plastic yellow land mines. Restrooms were clean and didn't have that dirty driver smell like so many do. Shower # 5 was clean with plenty of hot water that never ran out. Shower #7 was clean too with the same quality …

Good place.. I have running dedicated around this area for a month and never a wait for shower. Clean and restaurant is always ready to serve. Drop trailers can be irritating to some but the area dictates how the stop is used.  No …

Mostly ok... Only complaint I have is for the high price of a shower I'd think I could have had clean towels to dry off with. Mine was full of someone's hair knotted in it. Bathroom was mostly clean but could improve.

showerReviews.reviewText: Pretty good for a service area. The place was clean, organized and well maintained. The restrooms were amazing. this rest stop has lots of snacks and food (Auntie Anne's, Dunkin, Burger King, Chickfil-a (homophobic), Applegreen C-Store). …

Hopelessly crowded, limited car parking space, and the plaza has an upgraded gas station feel. Public restrooms are not sanitary or cleaned as often, knowing full well that demand is always high given the busy nature of the place!
Nice rest stop with plenty of dining options and seating. Clean restrooms and plenty of them. Aside from the chain food there’s also a nice little market for any generic items you might need.
Clean, reasonably priced items, variety of edibles, and drinkable
I almost always unintentionally stop here on my way home, but it's not my favorite place. The bathrooms constantly have staff in them cleaning but they're never really clean.
Very nice clean place you can eat there that Burger King bathroom is nice and a little convenience store on the side
Pretty much a brand new facility great food options very clean bathrooms if you need to stop when you’re leaving New Jersey and heading south I recommend stopping here.
Well the bathroom needs to be clean  few more times a day

showerReviews.reviewText: … showers 45% out of 100% …

… stopping in this Plaza just under 1 yr now. I intentionally avoid buying fuel here or spending any money in the store because of my disappointments. .... 1 st problem no showers. Then they installed showers and no matter how much fuel …

… I am living so close :) Wish to have place like that somewhere further.  Tasty food,  interesting stock,  prices of course not a Wallmart but affordable . Year after year they going better and better.  One minus is shower policy
Quick stop for a shower 🚿... Cheaper than the major truck stops... Got the job done …

… Spent the night and decided to get a shower. $13 well spent. Modern, roomy and clean. Had.the same tile in the shower stall l have at home. I loved the dual shower heads with the rainfall shower head above you! Felt like home. No soap …

I purchased 117 gallons of fuel and wanted a shower, but was told I had to pay $13.00 because they are an independent truck stop. I don't fuel anywhere but independent truck stops, and with few exceptions they give you a free shower. I know …

I've been coming here for years. I'm sure glad to have a shower. Just wish it was not cold. The restaurant is now under staffed. Poor service and undercooked food. Because of management. Again under staffed! Not  poor staff.

This is my 19th year driving and this was the absolute worst shower experience I've ever had, literally. The shower room like walking in to a sauna at around 105 degrees, no towels, no soap, and I still had to pay 10 dollars after …
It has good food, good quality and good price fuel but they should give free shower after 75 gallons instead 150. People there are very nice.
Showers are big and clean but there's no a/c inside showers and the fan doesn't help with the hot inside, I can't even imagine if I take a shower with hot water, I'll pass out...

showerReviews.reviewText: … parking, (if you fuel you can park free I think) $15 for 12hrs and $25 for 24hrs.  Also showers, coffee, and the ribs with yellow rice was great. I took off 1 star because my face and hands were covered with BBQ sauce when I was finished. I …

… going on. The store itself is pretty small but looks clean and organized. Bathroom is a unisex bathroom and only one available with only one shower. It unfortunately looks like the store closes so make sure to grab whatever you need …

… 24hr parking is 25$ and showers are an extra 14$ even if you paid for parking, I know they need to make their money to make up for this place, but from a drivers perspective 40$ to park and shower is just too steep, could make a discount …

$15 to park for 12 hours. $14 for shower, one towel only, bring your own. If you want a wash cloth you have to buy one.  There is no shelving in the shower. No place to put you toiletries.  No ventilation in the shower , so if you like hot …

I really like this place. It cost 15$ for a parking overnight or free if you purchase 100 gallons. 14$ for a shower or free if you purchase 100 gallons. The showers are clean too. Don't forget to bring your own towels. Sometimes they run …

… stop. Needs to be 24hr and have a better selection of food. Needs WIFI in the lot and laundry room. Shower was disgusting and they offer no towels. Sign on the door about bathrooms for customers only is a big turn off. I've driven …
25$ for 24 hr parking. Clean place, well lit at night. Clean bathrooms. shower for $15.

Has 4 bathroom shower 🚿 rooms for those on the road and in need of a shower for 14$ Also has an area to eat and relax at a car wash for your rig and gas station and mini Mart you can also park your rig over night for the price of 15$ for 12 …

Was here yesterday, showers clean, truck wash was good and people very nice. I will come back again
Parking : 15$ for 12h 25$ for 24h
Wash inside the trailer : 45$
Shower : 14$

Went for a shower . Paid with credit card . Asked for extra towel and then was informed they do not have towels . Had to supply my own . If they had said that I’m the beginning I would not have paid 12:$ for a shower.
